homepage.description: Stay safe in the mountains. Get daily avalanche reports and alerts for all regions in Austria and Italy.

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of the App
purpose.body: Montis is a mobile application that displays current avalanche reports, danger levels and warnings for regions in Austria and Italy. Only the personal data necessary for operation are processed.

collected-data.title: 3. Data Collected
collected-data.regions2: stored in Appwrite to sync your subscribed regions
collected-data.note: No sensitive data, payment data or advertising IDs are processed.

data-processing.title: 4. Data Processing
data-processing.body: Data processing is carried out via Appwrite Cloud Services (EU servers). All connections are encrypted (HTTPS/TLS). Only the minimum required data are stored.

third-parties.title: 5. Disclosure to Third Parties
third-parties.note: No data is used for advertising or analytics purposes.

user-rights.title: 6. User Rights
user-rights.intro: According to the GDPR you have the right to:
user-rights.item1: Access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing
user-rights.note2: Your account can be deleted upon request at any time.

data-security.title: 7. Data Security
data-security.body: All data is transmitted via HTTPS. Passwords are stored encrypted (never in plain text). Authentication is handled via Appwrite.

changes.title: 8. Changes
changes.body: This policy may be updated if the app or legal requirements change. The date of the last update is shown above.

support.about-text: Montis is a mobile app that displays current avalanche reports, danger levels, and warnings for regions in Austria and Italy. It helps mountain sports enthusiasts stay safe in the Alps.
